thread.section_title: Mercure Paris Centre Tour Eiffel - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Awesome hotel
thread.title_full: Awesome hotel - Review of Mercure Paris Centre Tour Eiffel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: RÃºben S
title: Awesome hotel
text: For anyone who wants to visit Paris, this is the best hotel to stay, close to everything important just walking (Eiffel Tower, bridges, senne, and other monuments of interest), and if you are lucky you will get the same view that we got. Staff are super friendly and kind, speaking english when you need it. The rooms are very confy and the bed is so much confortable, best bed I ever slept. We got some tea bags and some coffee on our room with a electric water heater. The shower is so relaxing too.
